meanings: (상태·품질 등이) good, fine, nice; (다른 것보다) better (than), superior (to)
Strangers when a good thing happens, and relatives when a bad thing happens

phrases.phrase: 좋은 노래도 세 번 들으면 귀가 싫어한다
meanings: Your ears will be fed up with a good song if it is repeated three times

phrases.phrase: 좋은 일은 맞지 않아도 나쁜 일은 잘 맞는다
meanings: Positive expectations tend to miss the mark while negative expectations tend to hit the mark

vlive.korean: 우석이 머리 좀 잘랐으면 좋겠지 않아 솔직히? Don't you want him to have a haircut? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [PENTAGON] ※미래형 머리!!※ 눈을 가려도 귀여움은 가려지지 않는 요정들만 가능💇🏻‍♂️ (PENTAGON talking about WOOSEOK’s hair)
vlive.english: Don't you want him to have a haircut?

examples.korean: ‘Oh well, better luck next time,’ she sighed. 발음듣기 “뭐 저, 다음번에는 운이 더 좋겠지.” 그녀가 한숨을 쉬며 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Oh well, better luck next time,’ she sighed. 발음

examples.korean: It’d be good to be there, but I’m not that fussed. 발음듣기 거기 가면 좋겠지, 하지만 난 그러고 싶지가 않아. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’d be good to be there, but I’m not that fussed. 발음

examples.korean: Is it best to reserve it now? 발음듣기 지금 택시 예약해 두는 게 좋겠지? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Is it best to reserve it now? 발음

examples.korean: Yeah, it's probably a good idea, just in case. 발음듣기 그래, 혹시 모르니까 맞는 게 좋겠지. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Yeah, it's probably a good idea, just in case. 발음

examples.korean: Man: Ideally, we would let everyone work as much and as long as they want to. 발음듣기 M: 물론 모든 사람들이 그들이 원하는 만큼 오래 일할 수 있도록 하는 게 가장 좋겠지. Neungyule
examples.english: Man: Ideally, we would let everyone work as much and as long as they want to. 발음
